sen.j: 上御霊前通（かみごりょうまえどおり）は京都市内の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Kamigoryomae-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.
Kamigoryomae-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.
Kamigoryomae-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 東は鴨川 (淀川水系)の加茂街道から、西は智恵光院通まで。
sen.e: The street runs from Kamo Street of Kamogawa River (Yodo River water system) in the east to west on Chiekoin-dori Street.
The street runs from Kamo Street of Kamogawa River (Yodo River water system) in the east to Chiekoin-dori Street in the west.
The street runs from Kamo kaido of Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River water system) in the east to Chiekoin-dori Street in the west.
sen.cmt: Kamo kaido, Kamo-gawa River, Yodo-gawa Riverとしました。

sen.j: 一筋北の鞍馬口通が北区 (京都市)の南限を通るため、上御霊前通が上京区を東西に貫くもっとも北の通りとなる。
sen.e: Kuramaguchi-dori Street is one street north of Kamigoryomae-dori Street which goes through the southern limit of Kita-ku Ward (Kyoto City) and so Kamigoryomae-dori is the northern limit of Kamigyo-ku Ward in east-west bound.

Kuramaguchi-dori Street is one street north of Kamigoryomae-dori Street which goes through the southern limit of Kita-ku Ward (Kyoto City) which makes Kamigoryomae-dori Street the northern limit of Kamigyo-ku Ward from east to west.

Kuramaguchi-dori Street is one street north of Kamigoryomae-dori Street which goes through the southern limit of Kita Ward (Kyoto City) which makes Kamigoryomae-dori Street the northern limit of Kamigyo Ward from east to west.
sen.cmt: Kita-ku Ward→Kita Ward, Kamigyo-ku Ward→Kamigyo Wardとしました。

sen.j: 全区間にわたり、道幅は広くなく、通行量も少ない。
sen.e: The street is not broad and the traffice is low.
The street is not broad and there is little traffic.
The street is not broad and there is little traffic.

sen.j: 新町通から大宮通にかけては、寺院の集中する寺之内の一角である。
sen.e: Between Shimachi-dori Street and Omiya-dori Street, it is a part of Teranouchi where many temples are closed up.
Between Shimachi-dori Street and Omiya-dori Street, it is a part of Teranouchi where many temples are closed.
Between Shinmachi-dori Street and Omiya-dori Street, it is a part of Teranouchi where many temples are closed.

sen.j: 他の区間は小規模な商店が点在し、市街地の住宅が並ぶ。
sen.e: In other section, there are some small stores and urban houses.
In other sections, there are small stores and urban houses.
In other sections, there are small stores and urban houses.

sen.j: 名称は応仁の乱勃発の地である上御霊神社の門前を通ることからつけられた。
sen.e: The street is named as "Kamigoryomae-dori Street" because it passes Kamigoryo-jinja Shrine where Onin war broke out.
The street is named "Kamigoryomae-dori Street" because it passes Kamigoryo-jinja Shrine where the Onin war broke out.
The street is named "Kamigoryomae-dori Street" because it passes Kamigoryo-jinja Shrine where the Onin war broke out.
Facilities on the main roadside
Facilities on the main roadside
Facilities on the Main Roadside
sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字にしました。

sen.j: 西園寺 寺町通上御霊上ル
sen.e: Saionji-Temple Teramachi-dori Street Kamigoryo Agaru

sen.j: 妙顕寺 上御霊前通新町西入 ただし正面は反対の寺之内通側
sen.e: Myoken-ji Temple Kamigoryomae-dori Street Shimachi Nishi Iru, the entrance gate is located at Teranouchi-dori Street which is the opposite side.
